 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּעָה‎</span>] **verb** ==groan== (onomatopoetic according to [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]; Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***bleat***, so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּעָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bleat***,); — ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּיּוֺלֵדָה אֶפְעֶה‎</span> [[Isa.42.14|Isa 42:14]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> staining himself to deliver Israel, +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשֹּׁם‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁם‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁאַף‎</span>). — [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפַע‎</span>] [[Isa.41.26|Isa 41:26]]..
